name: Vitamin C (THD Ascorbate)
description: A highly stable, oil-soluble form of Vitamin C that penetrates deep into the skin to brighten complexions and stimulate collagen production.

name: Hyaluronic Acid
description: A moisture-binding molecule that can hold up to 1000 times its weight in water, providing immediate and long-lasting hydration.

name: Moonstone Extract
description: A rare mineral extract that balances the skin's energy and enhances its natural radiance, reflecting light for an ethereal glow.

name: Bakuchiol
description: A plant-derived alternative to retinol that provides similar anti-aging benefits without the irritation or sun sensitivity.
